Package embedding.nearestNeighbors

Class KNearestNeighborGraph<T>

java.lang.Object
embedding.nearestNeighbors.KNearestNeighborGraph<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of objects to be compared. The used Measure must also be applicable for this type.
Direct Known Subclasses:
NearestNeighborBruteForce, NearestNeighborDescend
public abstract class KNearestNeighborGraph<T>
extends java.lang.Object
A KNearestNeighborGraph object can be used to find the k most similar objects regarding a measure for every single object. All the objects use are provided as an array.

Implementations should try to reuse previous calculations so that calculating the neighborhood graph a second time for a different k is quicker than calculating that graph from scratch.

Author:
Anton Ballmaier

      k - neighborhood size
      nodes - objects to be compared
